journals.entry: today i realized how important it is to take breaks during work. i was much more productive when i stepped away for 10 minutes every hour.
need to remember to call mom this weekend. she's been feeling lonely since dad passed away.
journaling helps me process my thoughts better than i expected. i'll try to make this a daily habit.
Today I learned how to use tailwind css properly and I really enjoy it. I no longer confuse it with inline styling.

goals.title: Exercise Regularly
goals.description: Go for a 30-minute walk every morning.

goals.title: Daily Journaling
goals.description: Write at least 3 sentences about how you felt today.

goals.title: Practice Gratitude
goals.description: List 3 things you're thankful for each night.

goals.title: Practice Mindfulness
goals.description: Meditate for 10 minutes every morning to stay grounded.

goals.title: Improve Sleep Hygiene
goals.description: Stick to a sleep schedule and avoid screens 30 minutes before bed.

goals.title: Limit Social Media
goals.description: Reduce daily screen time and spend more time offline.

goals.title: Express Emotions
goals.description: Write down or share feelings openly once a day.

goals.title: Celebrate Small Wins
goals.description: Acknowledge one thing you did well each day.

goals.title: Drink More Water
goals.description: Aim for at least 6â€“8 glasses of water daily to stay refreshed.

goals.title: Daily Reflection
goals.description: Reflect each night on what lifted or drained your mood.

goals.title: Facial improvement
goals.description: Go for a facial analysis and start skin care maintaining consistency
